resources.string: Hello, welcome to the about page. The '6 Week Fitness Workout' app will help you gain muscles and confidence in the gym. By following this 6 week program, you'll get a step closer to the perfect beach body. This is only the muscle-gaining part for an awesome beach body. The other part, that consists of cardio and getting lean, will be out as soon as possible. Both parts will be united in this one app.

I'm not a trainer nor an experienced gymlad. Therefor I won't ask money for anything I publish. I made this app to make it myself easier to maintain fitnissing and workout in a structured way. All the exercises and knowledge can be found on the internet, so feel free to learn. This 6 week program can be found in "Men's Fitness" magazine. All the pictures used in this app can be found on the internet at workoutlabs.
